programme.desc: England v Bangladesh. Coverage of the opening match of the tournament, as the Group A rivals go head-to-head at the Oval in London. The sides last met each other in this format in a three-match series in Bangladesh last October, when England recorded a 2-1 victory, with all-rounder Ben Stokes claiming the player of the series award. Following this encounter, England will also face matches against New Zealand and New Zealand, with the top two teams from the group progressing to the semi-finals.(n)
